sentences.sContent: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.sContent_eng: That morning we fired our first kiln of charcoal.
sentences.sCn: 那天上午，我们烧了我们的第一窑木炭。

sentences.sContent: Operate kiln to bake clay products to specified hardness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Operate kiln to bake clay products to specified hardness.
sentences.sCn: 操作窑来烘烤粘土制品到指定的硬度。

sentences.sContent: The system uses the heat from waste gases produced in the kiln during the cement-making process both to dry the cement and to heat water in a boiler that drives a turbine to produce electricity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The system uses the heat from waste gases produced in the kiln during the cement-making process both to dry the cement and to heat water in a boiler that drives a turbine to produce electricity.
sentences.sCn: 这套设备利用了水泥窑在生产时排放出的废气中的热量，通过热交换的原理，既晾干了水泥熟料，又加热了锅炉里的水，从而形成水蒸气，最后推动涡轮转动发电。

synos.tran: （砖，石灰等的）[炉窑]窑；炉；干燥炉

remMethod.val: 煤窑 (kiln) 倒塌杀死 (kill) 了许多人

trans.tranOther: a special oven for baking clay pots, bricks etc
